titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties answer to the propositions, propounded by the ministers of the Church of England; concerning the setling of the Presbyterian government within this kingdome. With his majesties resolution, about giving his royall assent thereunto. Also, the Earl of Pembrokes reply to the Kings Majesties desires. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Pembroke, Philip Herbert, Earl of, 1584-1650.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: A narrative, not in fact Charles I's answer or the Earl of Pembroke's reply.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "1646"; the 7 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
